definition: to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude

sentences.english: This paper studies the morphology of the Tibetan dwellings in the southeast of Ganzi.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究甘孜州东南部地区藏族民居的形态。

sentences.english: The formaldehyde was a main factor influencing the indoor air quality of rural local-style dwelling houses.
sentences.chinese: 甲醛是影响农村民居室内空气质量的主要因素。

sentences.english: In jinyan under the assistance, they found a simple Shanghai residents.
sentences.chinese: 在金燕的协助下，她们找到了一家俭朴的上海民居。

sentences.english: And Yunnan Yikeyin Dwelling is his pioneering research.
sentences.chinese: 而《云南一颗印》是中国民居研究的创举。

sentences.english: Meanwhile the zigzagged corridor and deep courtyard demonstrate the harmony between the residence and nature.
sentences.chinese: 回廊曲折，庭院深深，体现了民居和自然的和谐之美。

sentences.english: Nearly two-thirds of all residences in Tokyo were destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 在东京，约三分之二的民居遭到破坏。

sentences.english: The traditional houses of Xingjiang have evident local style.
sentences.chinese: 新疆民居具有明显的地方特色。

sentences.english: Dwelling houses look quite good and modern.
sentences.chinese: 民居相当好，充满现代化气息。

sentences.english: The houses cling to the hillside as if hung there by the wind.
sentences.chinese: 民居紧紧贴住山坡上，似乎是由海风的力量固定着的。

sentences.english: Siheyuan - the courtyard residence was a typical housing arrangement in Beijing for hundreds of years.
sentences.chinese: 四合院曾经是北京的一种典型的民居。

sentences.english: Along a five foot source, more than ten residential buildings built in water.
sentences.chinese: 沿着一条五尺源，十余幢民居临水而建。

sentences.english: Cosmic consciousness is the constitute of the mentality culture of Tianshui conventional civilian residential housing.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙意识是天水民居文化的组成部分。

sentences.english: Earthen houses and temples are mainstream buildings and there is less independent landscape creation.
sentences.chinese: 兴造以土楼民居和寺庙为主流，较少独立园林创作。

sentences.english: The majority of dwellings are double-oriented and they have therefore natural cross ventilation.
sentences.chinese: 大多数民居都是双向设计，因此拥有自然交叉通风。

sentences.english: You see this is a traditional Daur house.
sentences.chinese: 你看，这就是达斡尔族的传统民居。

sentences.english: Hakka Earth Building is a circular model of residential living.
sentences.chinese: 圆形土楼是客家人居住的典范民居。

definition: residence consisting of structures surrounding a courtyard on three sides
courtyard house with a fully enclosed courtyard (type of Chinese residence)
